faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is the Product Data API?
faq.a1: Our API allows you to extract detailed product information from any e-commerce store. You get prices, descriptions, images, stock status, and much more in real-time.
faq.q2: How does the credit system work?
faq.a2: Each API call consumes 1 credit. You can purchase credits in packages that never expire. The more credits you buy, the better the price per credit.
faq.a3: Our API supports thousands of e-commerce sites worldwide, including Shopify, Amazon, eBay, Magento, PrestaShop, and many others.
faq.a4: Yes! Create your account and get free credits to test our API. No credit card required.
faq.a5: Our API typically responds in 2-5 seconds depending on the target site. We guarantee 99.9% uptime.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your remaining credits stay available until used.
